title: BRIEF-Spin Master Says Prevailed In A Lawsuit Alleging That Its Series Rusty Rivets, Infringed Copyrights Of Alleged Owner Of A 20 Year Old Comic Book
text:
BRIEF-Spin Master Says Prevailed In A Lawsuit Alleging That Its Series Rusty Rivets, Infringed Copyrights Of Alleged Owner Of A 20 Year Old Comic Book

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 26, 2019 18:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Spin Master Says Prevailed In A Lawsuit Alleging That Its Series Rusty Rivets, Infringed Copyrights Of Alleged Owner Of A 20 Year Old Comic Book Sept 26 (Reuters) - Spin Master Corp : * SPIN MASTER CORP - PREVAILED IN A LAWSUIT ALLEGING THAT ITS SERIES RUSTY RIVETS, INFRINGED COPYRIGHTS OF ALLEGED OWNER OF A 20 YEAR OLD COMIC BOOK * SPIN MASTER - DISTRICT COURT FOR CENTRAL DISTRICT OF CALIFORNIA RULED IN FAVOR OF SPIN MASTER AND VIACOM IN A SUMMARY JUDGMENT ORDER ISSUED SEPT 17 * SPIN MASTER - COURT DECISION ALSO DISMISSED CLAIMS AGAINST VIACOM AND ITS UNIT NICKELODEON FOR CONTRIBUTORY AND VICARIOUS COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

BRIEF-Spin Master Says Prevailed In A Lawsuit Alleging That Its Series Rusty Rivets, Infringed Copyrights Of Alleged Owner Of A 20 Year Old Comic Book
